<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Migration fix script for Incident Overview Landing Page</description> <name>OOB ITSM Landing Page 1 migration</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function(){ gs.debug("Attempting OOB NY landing page migration.");
var nyCCRE = '8a58283f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12c3'; var nyTree = { "8a58283f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12c3": [ "b678283f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12b4", "d789a87f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12c0" ], b678283f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12b4: [ "77f8a07f532c330083f3ddeeff7b1220", "99b8ac3f532c330083f3ddeeff7b127f", "a039647f532c330083f3ddeeff7b128f", "b959a47f532c330083f3ddeeff7b129b" ], d789a87f532c330083f3ddeeff7b12c0: ["5fb96c7f532c330083f3ddeeff7b1200"] }; var nyPermissions = ['4114ce4753703300e4e9ddeeff7b1203']; var orlandoCCRE = 'd287f749232000100e4bc50947bf6596';
UXFMigrationUtils.fixOOBNYLandingPage(nyCCRE, JSON.stringify(nyTree), nyPermissions, orlandoCCRE); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-10-20 17:47:25</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3f999366236000109fdec50947bf6514</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OOB ITSM Landing Page 1 migration</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="ITSM Landing Pages" source="sn_itsm_landing">a08206c85370330083f3ddeeff7b123a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="ITSM Landing Pages">a08206c85370330083f3ddeeff7b123a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3f999366236000109fdec50947bf6514</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-10-20 18:09:54</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
